summary: After finding his brother murdered after returning from duty, Webster searches for the perpetrators, but discovers a conspiracy that cuts deep inside the U.S. government.
cast: Michael Jai White|Max Ryan|Steve Austin|Ian Short|Allen Yates|Ashleigh Barnett|Carter Bratton|Shyra Thomas|Charles Page|Matthew Bentley|Joe Fidler|Ken Early|Bobby Burns|Jon Osbeck|JoAnna Pallante|Ken Strunk|Imani Lee|Brian Searle|Mike Dennis|Jon D. Wagner|John W. Lawson|Bo Roberts|Chester E. Tripp III|Michael Vehar|Aswan Harris|Dan Anders|Steven J. Colwell|Terrance Huff|Jim Owens|Nick Pirrmann|K.D. Richardson
title: Echo Effect
